description.value: Despite being a plant creature, this creature doesnâ€™t gain the standard immunities associated with creatures of the plant type. Instead, they gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Mind-affecting} effects, paralysis, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poison}, polymorph, sleep, and stunning effects, unless the effect specifies that it is effective against plants.

modifiers.name: Limited Plant Benefits
modifiers.notes: This creature gains a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against  Mind-affecting effects, paralysis,  Poison, polymorph, sleep, and stunning effects, unless the effect specifies that it is effective against plants.
